page.title: 03Youth Hostel, Tongue
page.content: There has been a Youth Hostel in Tongue for 40 years in what was orig inally an old lodge. It is no longer strictly confined to youth , people of all ages can become members of the Association. The charges vary from Â£2 fro 5 - 16 year olds to Â£2.75 for adults. People come from all over the world, sometimes on their own or as families or as school or club groups, but Germans are the most numerous overseas visitors. People who use the Youth Hostel have to do their own cooking and help with the chores before they leave.Beds must b4 made and the kitchen clean. The hostel is open from April to October.
